title: Upstream commits missed due to GCC dev stage

labels.name: upstream
labels.description: Issue regarding upstreaming gccrs into GCC

body:
jOnce we're done with #1705, we should think about how to proceed with commits such as https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/commit/de6cfd5d3710880cd97076f5b88fe629db69ffb2. These commits touch common gcc parts and as such cannot be merged upstream until May.

I think we should keep track of a `gcc-patch-dev-staging` branch, which should stay up to date with `gcc-patch-dev`. This branch will on top of that contains commits such as https://github.com/Rust-GCC/gccrs/commit/de6cfd5d3710880cd97076f5b88fe629db69ffb2, which we will need to send in once GCC 14 reaches stage 1 again.

The list is as follows (unfinished):

- [ ] de6cfd5d3710880cd97076f5b88fe629db69ffb2
- [ ] 0b8ab6dfa92ee3387c646b38f8f87963995133ed
